wikipedia_page.main:
Charlie Telfer (born 4 July 1995) is a Scottish footballer, who plays for Scottish League One club Falkirk as a midfielder.
He began his career with Rangers before a transfer to Dundee United in June 2014. He joined Livingston on loan in January 2016 for the rest of the 2015–16 season. After he was released by Dundee United, he joined Dutch club Almere City in August 2017. He returned to Scotland in 2018, spending one season at Greenock Morton, before joining Falkirk in 2019.
Telfer has represented Scotland at under-17, under-19 and under-21 level.
